LanguageData.ESCP_Orsimer_Logging: Enables a few log messages for the orichalcum Harmony patch.
LanguageData.ESCP_Orsimer_EnableOrichalcPatchTooltip: If enabled, anything an Orsimer forges out of orichalcum will be one quality level higher than it would normally be.\n\nChanging this setting will require a restart to take effect. Alternatively you can just lower the chance to 0%.
LanguageData.ESCP_Orsimer_EnableOrichalcPatchChance: The percentage chance the quality improvement occurs.
